items.headline: ‘You need a third job or a rich husband’: I fell victim to Allen Stanford’s multibillion-dollar Ponzi scheme and survived

items.headline: ‘He never asks for anything’: I’m 61 with a $1.5 million 401(k). My girlfriend says I do too much for my son, 28. Is she right?
items.summary_en: “I recently gave him $20,000 for a newer car and had him finance the rest.”

items.headline: ‘I would like to give her a head start in life’: My house rose in value by $500K. Do I gift it to my daughter at a bargain price?
items.summary_en: “I would sell it to her for enough to allow me to pay cash for a much smaller condo.”

items.headline: This shipbuilder’s stock soars to a fresh record as company wins contract to produce a new type of Navy frigate
items.summary_en: Shares of military shipbuilder Huntington Ingalls Industries were up sharply Monday, building on Friday’s surge that came after the U.S. Navy announced it had selected the company to design and build a new class of small warship.
